projects.title: CoMapeo Documentation
projects.description:
Official documentation for the CoMapeo platform. This site provides comprehensive guides, tutorials, and API references for users and developers working with CoMapeo - a participatory mapping tool designed for indigenous communities and environmental monitoring.

The documentation covers installation, configuration, data collection workflows, and best practices for deploying CoMapeo in the field.

status.notes: Essential resource for all CoMapeo deployments and users. Regularly updated with new features and community contributions.

projects.title: CoMapeo Config Spreadsheet Plugin
projects.description:
A Google Sheets plugin that allows users to define and generate CoMapeo configuration files (.comapeocat). It enables non-technical users to customize categories, fields, icons, presets, and translations for CoMapeo projects directly from a spreadsheet.

This tool is commonly used during trainings and deployments to adapt CoMapeo to local cultural, environmental, and organizational contexts without requiring direct editing of JSON files.

status.notes: Used in multiple trainings and deployments for customizing CoMapeo projects.
